name: Mine Your Business
description:
Mine Your Business

Submition for Historical Game Jam 6 . Made in collaboration with Leon, jgallus, CapuchinBounty and Sid Chou. Mine coals and avoid the mine collapsing 

Controls

Mouse Click, aim at the black coal pieces, avoid the red coal pieces

Credits

CapuchinBounty [SoundCloud] : Music

Sid Chou [itch] : Programing, Project Lead

jgallus [itch] : Art
